definition: to die without regret (idiom, from Analects)

sentences.english: To his family, their guilt, to work, but no regrets.
sentences.chinese: 對家人，她們心存內疚，對工作，卻無怨無悔。

sentences.english: Embracing warm blood, I sing of youth without regret. Look upon the horizon and know not when my ally would return.
sentences.chinese: 滿腔熱血唱出青春無悔，望穿天涯不知戰友何時回。

sentences.english: I will use their own youth and wisdom regretless contributing to the expensive unit.
sentences.chinese: 我將以自己的青春和智慧無悔地奉獻給貴單位。

sentences.english: You said so, you eat regretless all of the bitter tired.
sentences.chinese: 你說着無悔的話，爲你吃盡所有的苦累。

sentences.english: From this story we know that Great Loving-Kindness is without regrets. We will never have regrets.
sentences.chinese: 這段故事，我們就知道，大慈無悔，永遠都沒有後悔。

sentences.english: Greate your destiny and then go out and live it with absolutely no regrets.
sentences.chinese: 創造你自己的命運，並無怨無悔地過好每一天。

sentences.english: Jade love he, his sister-in-law birthday party still unrepentant.
sentences.chinese: 玉卿嫂苦求慶生，他仍無悔意。

sentences.english: The woman followed the men to suffer without complaint.
sentences.chinese: 而女人就無怨無悔地跟着男人受苦受難。

sentences.english: Love is a kind of persistent, even if the broken heart also feel no regret.
sentences.chinese: 愛是一種執着，即使心碎也覺得無悔。

sentences.english: I am right the clinging nebula, following its fading lights and never would I regret.
sentences.chinese: 我就是片執着的星雲，無悔的追逐它遠逝的光芒。

sentences.english: Fight a year in spring and summer, autumn and winter, cardiac life no regrets.
sentences.chinese: 拼一年春夏秋冬，搏一生無怨無悔。

sentences.english: Tens of thousands of fans greeted the squad, chanting “we do not regret the love.”
sentences.chinese: 成千上萬球迷前來迎接，齊聲高唱“愛你無悔”。

sentences.english: Dancing and tricking the night away without reflection or remorse.
sentences.chinese: 舞曲玩浪逐夜色，無悔無怨。

sentences.english: Create your won life and live without any regrets.
sentences.chinese: 創造自己的生活，無怨無悔地生活。

definition: to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
to offer respectfully/to consecrate/to dedicate/to devote
wind and rain/the elements/trials and hardships
